summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Valentine Week - The Seven Chapter Protocol app. All core features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Minor ESLint warnings: Missing dependencies in useEffect hooks in GlitchText.jsx, InteractiveGames.jsx, TerminalText.jsx - not critical but should be addressed
Webpack deprecation warnings for onAfterSetupMiddleware/onBeforeSetupMiddleware - cosmetic only
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is a frontend-only React app with localStorage for state persistence. Access code is 04101994. All 7 chapters have story, game, and reflection phases. Games include: MemoryMatchGame, RoadTripGame, ShieldDefenseGame, CodeChallengeGame, ConnectHeartsGame, BuildHomeGame, CatchRingGame. State resets between browser sessions unless localStorage is preserved.

landing_page.details: Terminal animation loads, glitch text effect works, dark theme with red accents applied

access_code_validation.details: Wrong code shows error with attempts remaining, correct code (04101994) grants access

chapter_hub.details: 7 chapters displayed, Chapter 1 unlocked, others locked, progress tracker shows 0/7

chapter_1_story.details: Story renders with terminal blocks, life stats, photo placeholders, narrative sections

journey_progress_tracker.details: Shows 7 milestones (Origin, Growth, Struggle, Rise, Destiny, Together, Forever)

memory_match_game.details: 12 cards (6 pairs), cards flip on click, matched pairs turn green, counter updates

photo_placeholders.details: Render with grid pattern, corner brackets, hover effects

navigation.details: Return to Hub works, chapter navigation works

dark_theme.details: Dark background (rgb(5,5,5)), red primary color accents throughout

reflection_questionnaire.details: Code review confirms multiple question types: text, scale (1-10), choice
